title: “Citizen Canine” The Evolution of Our Pets (Rebroadcast)
teaser: Cats and dogs have become such a part of the family fabric that in many households, they're akin to children. "Science" journalist David Grimm joins Kojo to talk about how our connections to pets are changing laws, industries, and lives.
